General.Name: Meditera Tibbi Malzeme Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Meditera Tibbi Malzeme Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi manufactures and sells medical devices in Turkey. The company offers breathing sytems products, including conventional breathing circuits, breathing filters, catheter mounts, gas sampling lines, accessories, masks, and connectors. It also provides barrier cream, surgical hand brushes for skin disinfection, hand and skin antiseptics, and skin and mucosa antiseptics hospital products. The company also exports its products to 80 countries. Meditera Tibbi Malzeme Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1983 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.
General.Address: Ibni Melek OSB Mahallesi, TOSBI Yol 4, Izmir, Turkey, 35900
